mapper.select: select s.*,t.name as "templateName" from JXPJ_XSPJ_SET s LEFT JOIN JXPJ_XSPJ_TEMPLATE t on t.code = s.TEMPLATE_CODE
SELECT TT.IDX,T.* FROM JXPJ_XSPJ_TEMPLATE_TARGET TT LEFT JOIN JXPJ_XSPJ_TARGET T ON TT.TARGET_CODE = T.CODE WHERE TT.TEMPLATE_CODE = (SELECT TEMPLATE_CODE FROM JXPJ_XSPJ_SET where end_date > SYSDATE)
